item.title: [bro] Sardian Cliffstomper
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur Barbarian

As long as it's your turn and you control four or more Mountains, Sardian Cliffstomper gets +X/+0, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

item.title: [j22] Spectral Sailor
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

{3}{U}: Draw a card.

https://twitter.com/fuzichoco/status/1590902739449810944

item.title: [j22] Kibo, Uktabi Prince
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Monkey NOble

{T}: Each player creates a colorless artifact token named Banana with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add {R} or {G}. You gain 2 life."

Whenever an artifact an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control that's an Ape or Monkey.

Whenever Kibo attacks, defending player sacrifices an artifact.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [j22] Karn Liberated
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Karn

+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.

−3: Exile target permanent.

−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Jace, the Mind Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Jace

+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Felidar Sovereign
item.description:
Creature — Cat Beast

Vigilance, lifelink

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Violent Outburst
item.description:
Instant

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Lord Windgrace
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Windgrace

+2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.

−3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

−11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.

Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1649098495

item.title: [sld] Descendants' Path
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card that shares a creature type with a creature you control, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you don't cast it, put it on the bottom of your library.
